description: Jeff Cannata delivers the newest info, latest releases & best stuff in Video Games. Everything from Nintendo, XBox, Playstation and VR, Newest Latest Best is the everyday podcast fix for the avid gamer.
title: Newest Latest Best

episodes.title: Farewell
episodes.description: Jeff bids a fond farewell to NLB on Anchor and plays more of your Top 5 games lists.

episodes.title: Mailbag episode
episodes.description: Jeff answers listener questions about the Vive, Xbox One X, and Sony.

episodes.title: New games coming out this week
episodes.description: Jeff runs down all the big releases in video games this week.

episodes.title: Listener Top 5s
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the top 5 games of all time lists sent in by listeners of the show.

episodes.title: Kingdom Hearts 3, Sairento
episodes.description: A new trailer and details about Kingdom Hearts 3 hits the web, and Jeff becomes a cybernetic ninja in Sairento.

episodes.title: Egress, Sprint Vector, big $
episodes.description: Egress announced, Acivision makes billions from micro transactions, and Jeff loves Sprint Vector

episodes.title: Metro Exodus, Subnautica
episodes.description: New details about the upcoming Metro Exodus, and Jeff plays Subnautica.

episodes.title: E3, Metroid Prime 4, Surge 2
episodes.description: E3 public tickets sale date announced. Has the Metroid Prime 4 developer been discovered? The Surge 2 announced. Fear the Wolves announced.

episodes.title: Red Dead Redemption 2, PUBG
episodes.description: First details surface for Red Dead Redemption 2, Xbox One PUBG bundle, more Crash Bandicoot games.

episodes.title: New games releasing this week
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the biggest video games releasing this week.

episodes.title: Listener Top 5s
episodes.description: Another Sunday brings another set of Top 5 Games of All Time lists as submitted by listeners like you!

episodes.title: Children of Morta
episodes.description: Jeff spend an entire episode telling you why you should keep an eye out for the upcoming game, Children of Morta.

episodes.title: Far Cry 5,Monster Hunter,Sony
episodes.description: Far Cry 5 announces its season pass content, Kaz Hirai steps down at Sony, and Jeff talks about defeating an Anjanath in Monster Hunter World.

episodes.title: Switch Online, Red Dead 2 date
episodes.description: Nintendo announces details about their long awaited online service for Switch, as well as a new mobile game and a Mario movie. And Red Dead Redemption 2 gets an official release date.

episodes.title: WoW addon, Anthem, Star Wars
episodes.description: The new World of Warcraft expansion goes up for preorder, EA’s earnings call reveals info about Anthem, Battlefield, and Star Wars Games, and PUBG makes a whole lot of money.

episodes.title: MS buying EA? Monster Hunter
episodes.description: Is Microsoft planning to acquire EA? What does the Game Pass announcement mean for retailers? Monster Hunter Workd ships 5 million units.

episodes.title: New games,Monster Hunter World
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the biggest new game releases this week, and discusses his initial hours playing Monster Hunter World.

episodes.title: Your Top 5 games of all time
episodes.description: The Sunday tradition continues as Jeff runs down more listener Top 5 Games of All Time lists.

episodes.title: Paragon, Iconoclasts, SotC
episodes.description: Epic shuts down Paragon, and Jeff discusses his time with Iconoclasts and Shadow of the Colossus remake.

episodes.title: Destiny2, Game Pass,Dead Cells
episodes.description: Destiny 2’s first big patch of 2018 announced, Xbox Game Pass continues to impress, Dead Cells gets a console release, and one of the rarest WiiU games is coming to Switch.

episodes.title: Anthem, Dragon Age, GDC data
episodes.description: Anthem is delayed, a new Dragon Age is coming, and some interesting data from developers.

episodes.title: Blizzard World,Wildlands, Labo
episodes.description: The new Blizzard World event his Overwatch, Game Pass includes PC games, Ghost Recon gets Loot Boxes, and more Labo talk.

episodes.title: God of War, Xbox Pass, Rust
episodes.description: God of War gets a release date, Microsoft adds new games to Xbox Game Pass, Minecraft marks insane sales numbers, and Rust finally leaves early access.

episodes.title: New games, NOLF VR, Beatsaber
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the big video game releases for the week, and gets excited for a No One Lives Forever VR mid, and Beatsaber.

episodes.title: Your Top 5 Games of All Time
episodes.description: Jeff Sunday tradition continues, as he talks about Top 5 games lists submitted from listeners like you.

episodes.title: Slay the Spire, Nintendo Labo
episodes.description: Jeff stayed up way past his bedtime hooked on Slay the Spire, and more listener feedback about Nintendo Labo, including a correction.

episodes.title: More on Nintendo Labo
episodes.description: Jeff answers some calls about the big Nintendo Labo announcement.

episodes.title: Nintendo Labo,Aliens,Overwatch
episodes.description: Nintendo’s new way for kids to interact with Switch is a bold innovative idea, a new game based on the Aliens is in development, and the Overwatch League debuted to great ratings.

episodes.title: Xbox Elite, Fable, Innerspace
episodes.description: What’s Nintendo’s latest tease? Is there a new Fable game coming? Will the Xbox Elite controller get an upgrade?  Plus, Jeff enjoys the trippy new exploration game, Innerspace.

episodes.title: Scribblenauts, Cyberpunk, FFXV
episodes.description: The Scribblenauts franchise is coming back, Cyberpunk 2077 may be at E3 2018, and Final Fantasy XV is getting a new bundled release on PC and console.

episodes.title: New game releases,Switch hopes
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the new games coming out this week and answers a viewer question about the dream lineup from Nintendo for Switch.

episodes.title: Your Top 5 Games of All Time
episodes.description: Jeff returns to the Sunday tradition of looking at lists of Top 5 Games from listeners like you.

episodes.title: DICE Noms, Xbox Duke, AC:Rogue
episodes.description: The D.I.C.E. Awards Nominations announced, and released dates in March for the retro Xbox Duke controller and Assassin’s Creed Rogue remaster.

episodes.title: OrbusVR
episodes.description: Jeff discusses what he think is so special about the early access MMO made entirely for VR, called OrbusVR.

episodes.title: Nintendo Direct, Dark Souls
episodes.description: Jeff runs down This morning’s new Nintendo Direct Mini with all its exciting Nintendo Switch announcements, including Dark Souls Remastered!

episodes.title: Opus Magnum
episodes.description: Jeff describe’s his new gam big obsession, Opus Magnum

episodes.title: Star War The Void VR
episodes.description: Jeff and special guests Peter Sciretta from /Film and Reza Lackey from Caffeine.tv discuss their experience in The Void location VR experience with the new Star Wars Secrets of the Empire live from Disneyland.

episodes.title: Goragoa, Civ 6, Digital items
episodes.description: Jeff discusses 2 excellent iPad games he’s been playing, Goragoa and Civilization VI, and answers a call in about digital goods.

episodes.title: Burnout Paradise HD, PUBG, PSN
episodes.description: Jeff discusses an HD Remaster of Burnout Paradise, more Battle Royale modes in games, and PSN’s most downloaded games of 2017.

episodes.title: Marvel games, Switch, MH World
episodes.description: A Naughty Dog creative director moves to an Aveners game, MS offers refunds, Switch is the best selling US console ever, and PC players have to wait for Monster Hunter World.

episodes.title: 7th Continent interview
episodes.description: Jeff interviews Bruno Sautter from Serious Poulp about 7th Continent, the game that ranked as Jeff’s favorite Board Game of 2017.

episodes.title: Top Board Games of 2017
episodes.description: Jeff gets called to the carpet for not naming his top board games of 2017, so here they are!

episodes.description: More great lists of top games of 2017 as submitted by you!

episodes.title: More of your Top Games of 2017
episodes.description: On this the last day of 2017, Jeff discusses more of your favorites from the year.

episodes.description: Jeff looks at more of the top games of 2017 as submitted by you!

episodes.title: More of your Top Games of 2017
episodes.description: The march to the end of the year continues as Jeff talks through more top games of 2017 as submitted by you!

episodes.description: The last days of 2017 continue as Jeff looks at the game you have submitted as your favorites of 2017

episodes.title: More of your top games of 2017
episodes.description: You’ve been sending in lists of your top games of the year and Jeff is listening! Check out more eclectic lists of the best games of 2017.

episodes.title: More of your Top Games of 2017
episodes.description: Jeff continues to discuss your favorite games of 2017, including some dark horse picks.

episodes.description: Jeff spends Christmas morning discussing some of your favorites of 2017

episodes.description: Jeff discusses the Top games of 2017 as submitted by listeners like you!

episodes.title: Loot Boxes, Steam Awards
episodes.description: Apple introduces new guidelines in the App Store for using Loot Boxes, and Valve reveals the wonderfully eclectic Steam Awards nominees.

episodes.title: PUBG, Witcher, AC:O, Blizzard
episodes.description: PUBG goes 1.0, Witcher gets 4K, Blizzard revs up a new project, and Assassins Creed:Origins gets Final Fantasy.

episodes.title: Your Top Games of 2017
episodes.description: Listeners call in with their Top 3 Games of 2017, including hidden gems!

episodes.title: New games this week,Team Ninja
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the notable video game releases for the week, and discusses Team Ninja’s teases announcement.

episodes.title: Listener Top 5s of all time
episodes.description: Jeff runs through some Top 5 Games of All Time Lists dent in by listeners.

episodes.title: Heroes of the Storm patch
episodes.description: Jeff discusses the latest big changes to his favorite game, Heroes of The a Storm.

episodes.title: Dead or Alive6, Battle Royales
episodes.description: Will Team Ninja be announcing Dead or Alive 6? Fortnite adds a Battle Pass to its Season 2, and PlayerUnknown speaks out about copyright.

episodes.description: Listeners call in with their favorite Games of 2017

episodes.title: Ghost Recon, No No Kuni, PUBG
episodes.description: Ghost Recon Wildlands gets Predator, Ni No Kuni 2 is delayed, PUBG has problems on Xbox, and fishing in video games.

episodes.title: Destiny 2, Switch,Bad Company3
episodes.description: Jeff discusses the latest Destiny 2 outrage, Switch’s big sales, Assassin’s Creeds Origins’ new patch, and a rumor about the next Battlefield game.

episodes.title: New games, PUBG, SF 30
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the new games this week, and talks about Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Edition.

episodes.title: Top 5 Games from Listeners
episodes.description: Jeff discusses the Too 5 Games of All Time lists sent in by listeners of the show.

episodes.title: Hands on from PSX
episodes.description: Jeff is live at PlayStation Experience in Anaheim with hands on reports of The Last Guardian VR, Wipeout VR, Firewall, Shadow if the Colossus, and The Gardens Between.

episodes.title: Reveals from the Game Awards
episodes.description: The Game Awards came through with tons of new trailer and announcements. Jeff runs through all of the bright spots from the show.

episodes.title: Far Cry 5, Beyond Good & Evil2
episodes.description: A new Tomb Raider game coming in 2018? Far Cry 5 and The Crew 2 get delays. Beyond Good & Evil 2 still in production, and more.

episodes.title: New Portal? Doom VFR
episodes.description: A new portal game has been announced, but it might not be the game you were hoping for. Plus, Jeff plays Doom VFR.

episodes.title: God of War, Division, SF5
episodes.description: Did God of War’s release date leak? What’s this new Five Nights at Freddy’s game? Does the Division 1.8 revitalize the game? What are the details of Street Fighter 5’s Arcade Mode update?

episodes.title: New games this week, Mega Man
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the new game releases for the week, as well as news from Calvin about Mega Man 11 and more for Mega Man’s 30th anniversary next year.

episodes.title: Listener Top 5 Games
episodes.description: Jeff discusses Top 5 Games of All Time lists sent in by listeners.

episodes.title: Doki Doki Literature Club
episodes.description: Jeff discusses the strange phenomenon that is Doki Doki Literature Club on Steam.

episodes.title: Voice commands, Kinect, cereal
episodes.description: Jeff takes some call ins about the usefulness of voice commands in games and the wasted opportunity of the Kinect. Plus, Mario cereal is real!

episodes.title: Destiny 2, Civilization
episodes.description: Destiny 2’s State of the game, control your Ghost with Alexa, and Civ gets an expansion.

episodes.title: Destiny 2 controversy, Ode
episodes.description: Jeff recaps the latest in the Destiny 2 XP controversy, Yooka-Laylee coming to Switch, and Ubisoft’s surprise release of Ode

episodes.title: Mario Cereal, AC:Rogue, VR
episodes.description: Jeff rounds up some rumors, including Super Mario Cereal, a rerelease of Assassin’s Creed Rogue, and Remedy’s next project. Plus, a look at VR’s healthy sales numbers.

episodes.description: Jeff runs through the new releases of the week, and discusses Skyrim VR on PSVR.

episodes.description: Jeff examines Top 5 Games of All Tims lists sent in by listeners.

episodes.title: Destiny 2 XP, mobile games
episodes.description: Destiny 2 has its own loot box related controversy, and listeners recommend their favorite mobile games.

episodes.title: Questions, Lost Legacy, AC:O
episodes.description: Jeff answers some listener questions about Uncharted Lost Legacy’s lack of Game Awards Nominations, the interfaces on Xbox vs PlayStation, and the similarity among games.

episodes.title: Thanksgiving and Black Friday
episodes.description: Jeff runs down all of the best Black Friday deals in gaming to prep you for tomorrow!

episodes.title: Loot boxes, Hunt for the Ring
episodes.description: Loot boxes are now the target of lawmakers, and Jeff highlights more board games from his trip to BGG Con.

episodes.description: Jeff talks about some games he played at BGG Con that might be perfect for your Thanksgiving gatherings. Plus, a listener reports on PAX Unplugged.

episodes.description: Jeff runs down the new games coming out this week, and discusses Valkyria Chronicles 4 announcement, new Minecraft announcements, and more.

episodes.title: Listener Top 5’s
episodes.description: Jeff explores the Too 5 Games of All Time Lists went in by listeners.

episodes.title: BGG Con, Meeple Circus
episodes.description: Jeff is live at Board Game Geek Con 2017 talking about some of the great tabletop games he’s been playing, including Meeple Circus and Downforce.

episodes.title: Star Wars Battlefront 2 saga
episodes.description: The Star Wars Battlefront 2 road to release stayed crazy even hours before its debut. Jeff runs down the Latest.

episodes.title: PAX Ticket giveaway! Star Wars
episodes.description: Jeff is giving away 2 tickets to PAX Unplugged this weekend!  Listen to find out how!  Also, news about how much time and money Star Wars Battlefront 2 may cost, EA’s upcoming new franchise, and The end of Marvel Heroes.

episodes.title: Mario Movie, listener question
episodes.description: Rumor has it the same production company responsible for Despicable Me and Minions may be working on a Super Mario Bros movie, and a listeners has some questions for Jeff.

episodes.description: Jeff runs down the just announced nominees of the 2017 Game Awards.

episodes.description: EA acquires Respawn and Jeff recommends Hand of Fate 2

episodes.title: Xbox One X, AC Origins, HZD
episodes.description: Jeff answers some call ins about the Xbox One X vs a PC, Assassin’s Creed vs Horizon Zero Dawn, and games with throwback controls.

episodes.title: Xbox One X, GTA 5 sales
episodes.description: Jeff gives his impressions of the Xbox One X, and discusses the incredible sales of GTA V, and Ubisoft games.

episodes.title: Horizon The Frozen Wilds, news
episodes.description: Microsoft teases a streaming service, Skyrim gets a PSVT bundle, PlayStation Trophies get you rewards, Watch Dogs is free, and Jeff plays Horizon: Zero Dawn’s expansion, The Frozen Wilds.

episodes.description: Live from Blizzcon 2017, Jeff sits down with designers from Heroes of the Storm to dig into the nitty gritty about what's changing in his favorite game.

episodes.title: Blizzcon 2017 announcements
episodes.description: Jeff is Live at Blizzcon 2017 with all of the huge game announcements for Wow, Overwatch, Hearthstone, Starcraft, and Heroes of the Storm.

episodes.title: Assassins Creed Origins, Mario
episodes.description: Jeff is still really enjoying Assassin's Creed Origins, and a listener is reminded of an older game.

episodes.title: Star Wars Battlefront2, Dreams
episodes.description: EA has outlined changes to the way progression and loot crates will be handled in Star Wars Battlefront 2 following blowback from the beta, and where's Sony no-show from Paris Games Week, Dreams?

episodes.title: Mario Odyssey, CCP, Doom, VR
episodes.description: Mario Odyssey sells 2 million in 4 days, CCP ends production in VR games, Doom VFR adds Aim support, and an unexpected Oct 27th game from a listener.

episodes.description: Jeff runs down the new games for the week, and details a jam packed slate of announcements from Sony at the Paris Games Week show.

episodes.title: Listener Top 5 Games Ever
episodes.description: Jeff dives into more Top 5 Games of all time lists submitted by listeners.

episodes.title: Super Mario Odyssey, AC:Origin
episodes.description: Jeff discusses playing Super Mario Odyssey but in and out of co-op, and some listeners describe their Oct 27 buying decisions.

episodes.title: Big releases today, Pandemic
episodes.description: Is today the biggest single date for video game releases ever? Plus Pandemic Legacy season 2 and a game Jeff missed.

episodes.title: Assassins Creed Origins
episodes.description: Jeff has been playing Assassin's Creed: Origins and give his impressions so far.

episodes.title: Animal Crossing, MGS, Kinect
episodes.description: Nintendo announces new Animal Crossing mobile game for this year, Microsoft stood production of the Kinect, Metal Gear Survive gets a release date, Shadow of War's expansions get detailed.

episodes.title: Switch, Xbox, Dragonball, Lego
episodes.description: The Switch supports GameCube controllers, Original Xbox backwards compatibility on Xbox One begins, Dragonball Fighter Z gets a release date, and Levi Dimensions ends.

episodes.description: Jeff runs down what could be the biggest week of games releases in 2017, and lusts after the new SNES themed 3DS XL

episodes.description: Jeff runs down what promises to be the biggest week of game releases of the year, and spies a New Nintendo 3DS XL

episodes.description: NeoGAF shuts down amidst controversy, and Jeff discusses more listener Top 5 Games of All Time.

episodes.description: Big announcement about Destiny 2 seasons, and Jeff answers a question about his approach to VR games.

episodes.title: Megaton Rainfall, Arktika1, VR
episodes.description: Jeff has played 3 recent VR releases, Megaton Rainfall in PSVR, Arktika 1 on Oculus, and The Gallery Episode 2: Heart of the Emberstone on Vive.

episodes.title: Star Wars and Single Player
episodes.description: The cancellation of Star Wars from Visceral and what it means for single player games sparks a fantastic discussion from listeners.

episodes.description: EA makes the surprising move to cancel Amy Hennig's Star Wars game and close Visceral Games.

episodes.description: Jeff runs down a big week of game releases, and discusses Doom on Switch and Switch availability.

episodes.title: Top 5 Games of All Time
episodes.description: More listeners call in with their Top 5 Games of All Time lists.

episodes.title: Interview designer Ted Alspach
episodes.description: Jeff interviews board game designer Ted Alspach of Bezier Games.

episodes.title: Loot Boxes
episodes.description: Jeff discusses the scourge of loot boxes in video games, as listeners call in with their concerns.

episodes.title: Oculus Connect, Star Wars VR
episodes.description: Oculus Connect features big updates in hardware and software for the VR platform, as well as a major new game. Plus, Star Wars Secret of the Empire is the new Void experience at Disney Parks.

episodes.title: Mario Odyssey hands-on
episodes.description: Jeff got hands-on with new content from Mario Odyssey and came away with a very different impression than when he played it at E3.

episodes.title: Star Control 2, 2017, Loot box
episodes.description: A spiritual successor to Star Control II announced, 2017 releases ramp up through December, and what do you think of loot boxes in your games?

episodes.title: The 7th Continent
episodes.description: Jeff's plays a truly incredible board game: The 7th Continent.

episodes.title: Road Redemption, Too Many Game
episodes.description: Jeff remembers Road Rage on 3DO as he plays the new Road Redemption on Steam, and callers discuss the Too Many Games problem.

episodes.description: Jeff gives his impression of the SNES Classic Edition and discusses a new announced edition of Street a Fighter V. Plus a caller weighs in on Forza 7.

episodes.description: Jeff learns about Suikoden, and raves about Battle Chasers: Night War.

episodes.description: The SNES Classic releases today and callers have boots on the ground, in the trenches, grabbing them. Plus, calls about having too much good stuff to play.

episodes.description: Rockstar's weeklong tease ends with a new trailer for Red Dead Redemption 2, there's a whole lot of stuff to play this year, and maybe PUBG had a point when Fortnite's Battle Royale gets 1 million

episodes.description: Assassin's Creed Origins adds a Discovery Mode, Valve removes 200 games from Steam, and Jeff is delighted playing Steamworld Dig 2

episodes.description: Jeff goes hands on once again with Wolfenstein 2: The New Colossus before it launches, and is excited by today's new Star Wars Battlefront 2 trailer.

episodes.description: Jeff runs down all of the big game releases this week and ends with a positive message from a listener.

episodes.description: Jeff talks about playing Divinity:Original Sin 2 in co-op, and answers some questions about couch co-op, and addressing toxicity in games.

episodes.description: Fortnite announces a Battle Royale mode and PUBG threatens legal action, The Witness comes to iOS, and Jeff answers a question about Divinity Original Sin 2 and couch co-op

episodes.description: Jeff gets hands-on with DOOM on Nintendo Switch, the old original Xbox controller is coming back, and more audience discussion of toxic behavior in PUBG.

episodes.description: Blizzard updates Overwatch on Xbox One to mute abusive players, and Steam adds a histogram to user reviews. Then, Jeff answers questions about Divinity Original Sin 2's story.

episodes.description: Jeff runs down all of the big announcements from Sony's pre-Tokyo Game Show press conference, and answers a call in about yesterday's Fortnite cross-play news.

episodes.description: Jeff answers some call ins about Skyrim VR's movement problems, The joy of Destiny 2 with friends, and the accessibility of Madden 18

episodes.title: Bethesda event hands-on
episodes.description: Bethesda threw a big hands-on event and Jeff reports his experience with Skyrim on Switch, and Fallout 4, Skyrim, and Doom in VR.

episodes.title: Destiny 2, Divinity:OS 2
episodes.description: Destiny 2 has the biggest launch week of the year, and Jeff is blown away by Divinity: Original Sin 2

episodes.title: Naughty Dog, sequels, Top 5s
episodes.description: Bruce Straley leaves Naughty Dog, and Jeff answers questions about sequels iterating on games, and listeners Too 5 games of all time.

episodes.title: NES Classic, Sky, Apple VR
episodes.description: Nintendo announces the return of the NES Classic, Okami will be remastered again, no more Batman Arkhangelsk games? And Apple announces a new title from a great developer, and AR games.

episodes.title: New releases,Nintendo, Atomega
episodes.description: Jeff runs down a HUGE week of new game releases, discusses Nintendo's plans to have available hardware to buy this holiday season, and anticipates Atomega.

episodes.title: Madden18, board game essential
episodes.description: Jeff answers questions about Madden 18, and essential board games to get into the hobby.

episodes.title: Destiny 2 and Lore v Story
episodes.description: Jeff's Destiny 2 rant about Story and Lore prompted some fantastic responses, so today Jeff continues the discussion with listener call-ins.

episodes.title: Destiny 2 rant
episodes.description: Jeff rants about Destiny 2 and it's version of narrative storytelling. Life is not story!  Do you agree?

episodes.title: LA Noire, South Park, Destiny2
episodes.description: The LA Noire remaster is a reality, South Park The Fractured But Whole adds a brilliant, subversive difficulty setting, and Jeff gives his first impressions of Destiny 2.

episodes.title: Destiny 2, PAX interviews
episodes.description: Destiny 2 launches in PS4 and Xbox One today! PUBG hits 10 million sold, and Jeff has 2 more interviews from PAX West, for Pikuniku and Dunk Lords.

episodes.description: More of Jeff's indie developer interviews from PAX West - this time for UFO 50, Way of the Passive Fist, and Moonlighter.

episodes.title: New Games, PAX interviews
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the big game releases for this week, and has 2 interviews from PAX West in Seattle, for Survived By and Nine Parchments.

episodes.title: Best surprises of PAX Prime
episodes.description: Jeff has been scouring the show floor of PAX Prime 2017, searching for the very best games you haven't heard about: Griftlands, Hot Lava, Fort Triumph, Children of Morta, and Tiny Bubbles.

episodes.title: Conan Exiles interview
episodes.description: Jeff interviews Joel Bylos, the creative director of Conan Exiles about the game, early access, and game design, in a special, longer episode.

episodes.title: Top Fives, Last Day of June
episodes.description: Bungle offers support for Houston floods, listener top 5 of all time, and Jeff reviews Last Day of June.

episodes.title: Wolfenstein 2 interview
episodes.description: Special correspondent Raj Deut sits down with Tommy Bjork, narrative designer on Wolfenstein 2: The New Colossus at Gamescom.

episodes.title: Nintendo's Nindies stream
episodes.description: Nintendo had a new Nintendo Direct this morning announcing a huge new crop of Indie titles for Switch. Jeff runs down every game.

episodes.title: New VR sets, Xbox One, Nindies
episodes.description: Microsoft announces new Mixed Reality headsets, PSVR gets a price drop, Xbox One is discontinued, will companies allow cross-play? And Nintendo announces new Nindies event.

episodes.title: New games, Mario+Rabbid review
episodes.description: Jeff breaks down a huge week of video game releases, and then reviews Mario + Rabbids: Kingdom Battle

episodes.title: Bethesda Game of Thrones? HL3
episodes.description: A losing in Target's website suggests there might be a new Bethesda game with the Game if Thrones license? And Jeff answers some questions about Half-Life episode 3

episodes.title: Half-Life 3? Top 5 of All Time
episodes.description: A plot for what would have been Half-Life episode 3 surfaces, and Jeff finally is pinned down for his Top 5 video games of all time.

episodes.title: Secret of Mana, Xbox One X
episodes.description: Secret of Mana remaster announced, Xbox One X preorders sell well - what die shat mean for the system, and a call in about Injustice 2's DLC roster.

episodes.title: Dauntless, Metronomicon
episodes.description: Jeff discusses two games he's playing pre-release, Dauntless and Metronomicon: Slay the Dancefloor.

episodes.title: Crew 2, Gwent, Injustice 2, VR
episodes.description: The Crew 2 gets a release date, Gwent gets a single player story mode, Mario + Rabbids gets a season pass, Bethesda's VR slate gets release dates, and Injustice 2 gets 3 more characters.

episodes.title: SNES Classic, Shenmue 3, AoE 4
episodes.description: SNES Classic preorder madness, Shenmue 3 gets its first trailer, Bioshock 10th anniversary, Biomutant announced, Horizon Zero Dawn Story Mode, and Age of Empires IV announced

episodes.title: New games his week, Vive, iOS
episodes.description: New games releasing this week, a price drop for Vive, some listener suggestions for iOS game, and the Wits & Wagers Vegas expansion hits Kickstarter

episodes.title: Xbox at Gamescom, Uncharted
episodes.description: Jeff discusses the Xbox press conference at at GamesCom, and his thi gets after finishing Uncharted: The Lost Legacy

episodes.title: WePlayVR and Rez Infinite
episodes.description: Jeff got a chance to try location VR inside the 10x10 WePlayVR box, and a caller digs Rez Infinite in PC

episodes.title: Gencon boardgame announcements
episodes.description: Gen Con 50 starts today and there are announcements and debuts of 100s of new tabletop games, including Star Wars Legion, Civilization: A New Dawn, Twilight Imperium 4th Edition, Stuffed Fables & more

episodes.title: Uncharted: Lost Legacy & news
episodes.description: Crackdown 3 is delayed, Digital Extremes announces The Amazing Eternals, and Jeff plays Uncharted: The Lost Legacy

episodes.title: We Happy Few, Okami, EVE
episodes.description: We Happy Few gets a full release date, Namco teases Projekt#1514, Okami might get another rerelease, and EVE Valkyrie will be playable out of VR.

episodes.title: Agents of Mayhem, Exit
episodes.description: Jeff discusses Volition's new game, Agents of Mayhem, and the escape room in a box board game, Exit: The Abandoned Cabin

episodes.title: New releases this week, Oculus
episodes.description: Jeff discuss the new games releasing this week, and answers a call in about cramming in the very best VR experiences.

episodes.title: Hellblade, Elder Scrolls, RPGs
episodes.description: Jeff ran into a game killing glitch in Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice, and answers some call ins about Elder Scrolls Legends, his perfect RPG, and other shows he makes.

episodes.title: Mario Kart VR
episodes.description: Special report on Mario Kart VR in Japan!

episodes.title: NMS, NBA Live Demo, Gamerscore
episodes.description: We get details about the big No Man's Sky update, the NBA Live 18 demo goes live, Microsoft considers new gamerscore changes, and calls about under appreciated games and the Fallout board game.

episodes.title: Fallout 4 GOTY, Rez, Fictorum
episodes.description: Fallout 4 gets a Game of the Year Edition, and Jeff plays Rez Infinite on Oculus and Fictorum on Steam.

episodes.title: Artifact, Overwatch, Rez, NMS
episodes.description: Valve announces a DOTA digital card game, Overwatch kicks off its summer event, Rez Infinite arrives on Oculus and Vive, and No Man's Sky's anniversary update promises big things.

episodes.title: UFO50, DQB2, Metroid, Fallout
episodes.description: Spelunky creators new project is crazy, Dragon Quest Builders 2 is happening, Samus fancies up a New 3DS XL, and Fantasy Flight Games is bringing Fallout to the tabletop.

episodes.title: New Games this week, Horizon
episodes.description: Jeff runs down all the new releases for the week in gaming, and looks forward to the Horizon Zero Dawn expansion, The Frozen Wilds

episodes.title: Loot, Value, Flawed games
episodes.description: Jeff does his Sunday call in round up, answering questions about loot chests in games, value in digital purchases, and games that are more fun than they are good.

episodes.title: Shadow of War, Steam, digital
episodes.description: Shadow of War gets loot chests, Steam is booming, and Jeff is hopeful about the all-digital distribution future.

episodes.title: Crash, Star Wars VR, Fortnite
episodes.description: Crash Bandicoot N Sane Trilogy exceeds expectations and may lead to more classic revivals, Star Wars gets a VR attraction, and Jeff has more thoughts on Fortnite.

episodes.title: Lone Echo interview
episodes.description: Jeff interviews the President of Ready at Dawn about their incredible new VR game, Lone Echo

episodes.title: Tacoma review
episodes.description: Tacoma is released today, and Jeff brings his DLC cohost Christian Spicer to the show to review the game together. Spoilers at the end of the episode.

episodes.title: Dino Frontier
episodes.description: It's Jeff's birthday so he's talking about his latest VR obsession: Dino Frontier on PSVR.

episodes.title: New game releases, Pokémon Go
episodes.description: Jeff runs down all the interesting video game releases for the week ahead, and answers a call in question about Pokémon Go Fest.

episodes.title: Pyre, 3D printing, evvironment
episodes.description: Jeff talked about the importance of environment in games, and answers some questions about 3D printing, Pyre, and comfort in VR

episodes.title: Warframe, Nintendo, Apps
episodes.description: Jeff has been playing Warframe and it made him think about evolving games, and some listeners debate the Nintendo question. Plus some app suggestions!

episodes.title: Dragon Quest 11, Destiny, pyre
episodes.description: Dragon Quest 11 is coming to the West, Destiny 2 beta on PC gets a date, Jeff loves Pyre, and is Nintendo getting a pass on bad design?

episodes.title: Wolfenstein2, Games for Change
episodes.description: Jeff gets early hands-on with Wolfenstein 2: The New Colossus, and discusses Games for Change.

episodes.title: Switch sales, FFV co-op, green
episodes.description: Nintendo touts great sales for the Switch and reveals a bit of their upcoming roadmap, Final Fantasy XV tests its multiplayer DLC, and how to be environmentally responsible as a gamer.

episodes.title: Uncharted: The Lost Legacy
episodes.description: Jeff gets early hands on with Uncharted: The Lost Legacy, and sits down with the game's Director, Kurt Margenau.

episodes.title: New games this week, Dilemma
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the new video game releases for the week, and answers a question about reselling an SNES Classic edition.

episodes.title: Lone Echo, Echo Arena
episodes.description: Jeff goes crazy for Lone Echo on Oculus, but he is backed up by a listener who loves it, too.

episodes.title: Fortnite, Esports
episodes.description: Jeff has early impressions of the Fortnite Early Access launch, and answers a question about Esports franchises in LoL and Overwatch.

episodes.title: June NPD, Fire Pro Wrestling
episodes.description: The June NPD report has been released and Tekken 7 and Crash Bandicoot are big winners, plus Jeff enjoys Fire Pro Wrestling World, and answers a question about his recording equipment.

episodes.title: N64 Classic, Critics, Onward
episodes.description: Is Nintendo readying an N64 Classic edition before the SNES Classic has even been released? Jeff answers a few rapid fire questions, and a listener recommends Onward.

episodes.title: Destiny 2 beta, Switch App
episodes.description: The Nintendo Switch app is available ahead of the Splatoon 2 release, Titanfall 2 gets a co-op horse mode, Telltale announces sequels, and Jeff plays the Destiny 2 Beta

episodes.title: Marvel, Ready Player One, VR
episodes.description: Jeff answers some call ins about scale in Marvel Powers United VR, using Star Wars and Ready Player One to popularize VR tech, and gets a very fun Tale of Fail.

episodes.title: New releases, Spiel des Jahres
episodes.description: Jeff runs down an exciting week of new games releases, and takes a look at the just announced winners of the prestigious Spiel des Jahres board game awards.

episodes.title: D23 Marvel, Star Wars games
episodes.description: Disney's D23 video game announcements. Kingdom Hearts 3 gets a release year, Spider-Man behind the scenes, Marvel gets a VR game, and Star Wars gets an AR headset!

episodes.title: Aging, EVO 2017, Jotun
episodes.description: Jeff gets a bunch of great feedback on his discussion of growing older as a gamer, EVO fighting game championships are this weekend, and Jotun is free on Steam.

episodes.title: VR for $200, Vive Deluxe Audio
episodes.description: Is Oculus making way for a $200 untethered update in 2018?  Is Vive's Deluxe Audio Strap worth it?

episodes.title: Mario Kart VR, PUBG, Aging
episodes.description: There is a Mario Kart VR arcade in Japan, PUBG is getting 1st person servers, Ni No Kuni 2 delayed, and a question about growing old playing games.

episodes.title: Edith Finch, DOTA2, Sonic
episodes.description: One of Jeff's favorite games if he year arrives on Xbox One, DOTA 2 sets another record, and listeners weigh in on the Sonic the Hedgehog question.

episodes.title: Indie Megabooth interview
episodes.description: Jeff interviews Kelly Wallick from the Inide Games Megabooth. Use code NLB30 to get 30% off tickets to their event in Atlanta his Saturday!

episodes.title: New releases, white PS4Pro, VR
episodes.description: Jeff runs down the new video game releases for the week, the Destiny 2 white PS4 Pro bundle, WWE 2K17 coming to Switch, and a big price cut for Oculus Riff

episodes.title: SGDQ, Hearthstone, Fortnite
episodes.description: Summer Games Dine Quick raises $1.7 million for Doctors Without Borders, the new Hearthstone expansion announced, Fortnite is finally coming, and Jeff talks about old games getting teamsters.

episodes.title: Zelda DLC, ARMS, Spider-Man
episodes.description: New info about the best Breath of the Wild DLC, how does the new Spider-Man movie compare to what we know of the upcoming video game, and Jeff answers questions about ARMS and E3

episodes.title: Splatoon 2, PUBG, Sonic
episodes.description: The big Splatoon 2 Nintendo Direct, a delay for Player Unknown's Battlegrounds, and a look at why Sonic the Hedgehog doesn't seem to work.

episodes.title: Horizon, Shadow of War, Ethnos
episodes.description: Horizon Zero Dawn gets a new game plus update, Shadow of Mordor allows you to bring your characters into War, The Wonderful 101 might be coming back, and Ethnos is a delight on the table!

episodes.title: Assassins Creed, Destiny 2
episodes.description: Assassin's Creed animated series announced, Destiny 2 hub revealed, and Jeff answers a question about VR lobbies

episodes.title: Pathfinder Adventures, Anthem
episodes.description: Jeff discusses playing Pathfinders Adventures on Steam, Cuphead's exclusivity, and gets some audience feedback about yesterday's Anthem PS4 shenanigans.

episodes.title: Releases for the week, GDQ
episodes.description: New games releasing this week, Summer Games Done Quick highlights and Anthem PS4 trailer is Xbox One X gameplay

episodes.title: Releases for the week, GDQ
episodes.description: Newest Latest Best for July 3, 2017 • NLB • New video game releases for the week • Summer Games Done Quick • Anthem shenanigans

episodes.title: Tabletop time, Escape from 100
episodes.description: Table top time discussion with Reza Lackey and Peter Sciretta about Escape from 100 Million BC.

episodes.title: All about 4K gaming - 7/1/17
episodes.description: The Xbox One X is bringing naive 4K content to consoles. Jeff answers some call ins and gives his view on the future of gaming.
